subdisciplines.name: Archaeological Conservation
subdisciplines.description: The study and practice of preserving and restoring archaeological sites and artifacts.

subdisciplines.name: Cultural Heritage Tourism
subdisciplines.description: The use of historic and cultural resources for tourism or economic development purposes.

subdisciplines.name: Heritage Interpretation
subdisciplines.description: The process of communicating the significance of cultural resources to the public.

subdisciplines.name: Historic Preservation Planning
subdisciplines.description: The development of plans and policies for the preservation of historic resources.

subdisciplines.name: Museum Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the theory and practice of managing museums.
